namePrompt.speaker: The Voice
namePrompt.text: Before the gods, speak your name.

questions.speaker: The Voice
questions.text: A starving thief is caught with bread. What do you do?

evil.label: Punish them to set an example

questions.speaker: The Voice
questions.text: You find a lost pouch of coins on the road.

questions.speaker: The Voice
questions.text: A rival insults you in public.

questions.speaker: The Voice
questions.text: You can save one: a wounded stranger or your prized weapon.

questions.speaker: The Voice
questions.text: A village asks for help, but offers no reward.

questions.speaker: The Voice
questions.text: A friend asks you to lie for them.

good.label: Refuse, but protect them another way

questions.speaker: The Voice
questions.text: You defeat an enemy who cannot fight back.

questions.speaker: The Voice
questions.text: Power is offered to you—but someone else will suffer.

questions.speaker: The Voice
questions.text: You can take credit for another’s victory.

tiebreaker.speaker: The Voice
tiebreaker.text: Final truth: what guides your hand?

myriador.speaker: The Voice
myriador.text: {name}… your answers lean toward oath and light. Myriador opens for you.

dreadheim.speaker: The Voice
dreadheim.text: {name}… your answers carry iron and shadow. Dreadheim calls you.
